description: Try our easy to follow Vanilla, Mango & Raspberry Slice recipe. Absolutely delicious with the best ingredients from Woolworths.
name: Vanilla, Mango & Raspberry Slice Recipe | Woolworths

recipeInstructions.text: Beat cream with condensed milk until thick. Divide 3 equal portions into separate bowls. Stir vanilla into one portion, raspberry into second portion and mango purée into the remaining portion.

Line a 15cm deep square pan with a double layer of plastic. Line base with wafers, trimming to fit. Top with mango mixture. Freeze for 1 hour or until firm. Top with vanilla mixture and freeze for 1 hour. Finish with raspberry layer and top with wafers. Cover with plastic and freeze overnight until firm.
To serve, dip base of pan into hot water to loosen. Lift out and turn onto a serving platter. Cut into thick slices and serve with raspberries.
